taskList.title: Review Design Mockups
taskList.description: Provide feedback on the latest design mockups from the design team.

taskList.title: Write User Documentation
taskList.description: Draft user documentation for the new software release.

taskList.title: Prepare Quarterly Report
taskList.description: Compile data and insights for the quarterly report to stakeholders.

taskList.title: Complete Project Proposal
taskList.description: Write and finalize the project proposal for client approval.

taskList.title: Prepare Presentation Slides
taskList.description: Create slides for the upcoming client presentation.

taskList.title: Test New Feature
taskList.description: Conduct thorough testing of the new feature before deployment.

taskList.title: Resolve Bug Reports
taskList.description: Investigate and resolve reported bugs in the latest software build.

taskList.title: Update Database Schema
taskList.description: Implement changes to the database schema as per requirements.

taskList.title: Schedule Team Meeting
taskList.description: Coordinate schedules and plan the agenda for the next team meeting.

taskList.title: Deploy Application Update
taskList.description: Deploy the latest application update to the production environment.
